verses.name: 1 Timothy 5:11
verses.text: But the younger widows refuse: for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ, they will marry;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 5:12
verses.text: Having damnation, because they have cast off their first faith.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 5:13
verses.text: And withal they learn to be idle, wandering about from house to house; and not only idle, but tattlers also and busybodies, speaking things which they ought not.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 5:14
verses.text: I will therefore that the younger women marry, bear children, guide the house, give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 5:15
verses.text: For some are already turned aside after Satan.
